Markdown¶

Markdown is used in multiple places, git repos, dockerhub. I will add a few that I have used and a reference to GitHub’s Guide 1

Text¶

Bold

italics

**Bold**
*italics*

Lists¶

  • item 1

  • item 2

* item 1
* item 2
